name: couchdb-course
description: A hands-on learning repository for exploring Apache CouchDB, a NoSQL document database with a focus on ease of use and having a scalable architecture.

scripts.clean: docker compose down && sudo rm -rf ./.data && docker compose up -d && sleep 3
scripts.intro: npm run clean&& node src/intro/init.js && node src/intro/documents.js
scripts.nano: npm run clean && tsc && node dist/nano/nano.js
scripts.bulk: npm run clean && node src/bulk_n_index/bulk.js && node src/bulk_n_index/index.js
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run init && npm run documents && npm run views && npm run replicate
